function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Compulsory mouth and nose covering","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Phases of pandemic and government actions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shut down of public spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of specific restrictions and regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public behavioral responses to covid-19 and previous outbreaks of infectious behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-representative online survey sample","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on official governmental media as the primary source of information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Trust in the source of information as a predictor of protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dissemination of outdated or wrong health information through social media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of perceived susceptibility to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative emotion as a predictor of protective behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk perception not always associated with high preparedness for natural disasters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low level of concern about potential infection transmitted by asymptomatic carriers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining physical distance in densely-populated alone","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High adoption level of protective behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential response bias in study participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variations in disease contexts and measurement tools","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to adopt protective behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender and age disparities in adopting protective behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of official advice on protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low covid-19 knowledge among respondents","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk perception of severity of covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low perception of susceptibility to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of self-reported health ratings as opposed to objective health measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comparison of respondents from high-risk areas with other regions without accounting for confounding covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent or untrustworthy government communication may lead to public frustration and non-acceptance of advice during a health cultural perspectives on risk perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about covid-19 symptoms and
